## About

95+ assorted binary / bitwise operations, conversions, utilities.

### Status

**STABLE** - used in production

## Installation

```bash
yarn add @thi.ng/binary
```

Package sizes (gzipped): ESM: 1.9KB / CJS: 2.2KB / UMD: 1.8KB

## Dependencies

None
